@mixin buttons ($height: 60px, $width: 300px) { height: $height; width: $width; line-height: $height;&:hover { opacity: .8;} .button-one { @include buttons}.button-two { @include buttons}.button-three { @include buttons (200px, 200px)}

Mixin 2

@mixin einstein ($imgpath: url("images/a0c5f1c9.avatar.png")) { background-image: ($imgpath); height: 200px; width: 200px; border-radius: 100px; border-width: 2px; border-color: black; border-style: solid; -webkit-transition: all 0.6s ease; &:hover { width: 400px; height: 400px; border-radius: 200px; }}.avatar { @include einstein }.avatar-two { @include einstein }.avatar-three { @include einstein }

Mixin 3

@mixin boxes ($color: blue, $bordercolor: black) { display: block; width: 200px; height: 200px; background: $color; border-width: 6px; border-color: $bordercolor; border-style: solid;}.longbox { @include boxes}.longbox-two { @include boxes}.longbox-three { @include boxes (green, red)}
